meanings: (물체의) [명사] rotation, revolution, [동사] turn, rotate, revolve (around); (빠른 속도로) spin
left turn, turn left, make[take] a left
[명사] right turn, [동사] turn right, make[take] a right

examples.korean: The needle on the rev counter soared. 발음듣기 회전식 계측기 바늘이 치솟았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The needle on the rev counter soared. 발음

examples.korean: The taxi driver revved up his engine. 발음듣기 택시 기사가 엔진의 회전 속도를 올렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The taxi driver revved up his engine. 발음

examples.korean: She was known for the quickness of her wit. 발음듣기 그녀는 두뇌 회전이 빠른 것으로 유명했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was known for the quickness of her wit. 발음

examples.korean: 4000 revs per minute 발음듣기 분당 4 000번의 회전 속도 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Mars takes longer to revolve on its axis than the earth. 발음듣기 화성은 지구보다 축을 중심으로 회전하는 데 시간이 더 오래 걸린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Mars takes longer to revolve on its axis than the earth. 발음
